=MySQL=
==Create Database Structure==
*This is the command used to generate the database structure without the data*
{{{
mysqldump -d -hkaimac.ath.cx -uroot -p timeless > ./timeless_create.sql
}}}

=SVN=
==Trunk Checkout==
*This is the command used to check out the trunk to the current directory*

}}}
